Get Part.description: Snippet to create a variable to get a part, asserting that it is connected.

body: local ${1/^([A-Z]+?)(?=[A-Z][a-z]|[a-z]|$)(.*)$/${1:/downcase}${2}/g} = assert(GetPartFromPort(${2:1}, "${1:Screen}"), "expected ${1/(.*?)([a-z0-9]|[A-Z](?=[A-Z][a-z0-9]))([A-Z]|[0-9])?/${1:/downcase}${2:/downcase}${3:+ }${3:/downcase}/g} to be connected to port ${2}")
Get Part From Port.description: Snippet to create a variable to get a part from a port, asserting that it is connected.
